descriptionHtml:
Location : West of riften (Check Pictures for map location) Fast travel enabled 

Recommend Class Type for mod: Witch Hunter/Shaman/Spellblade/Warrior/Any Class 

Welcome to my redwood tower starter home,this is a guard tower converted into a living 
space for your char,simple but in a nice location and plenty of surrounding cover for 
your tower.Downstairs is a supply chest for storage and some wall holders for your 
weapons,upstairs is crafting tables another storage chest,strongbox of leveled items 
and a dresser with some armor & supplies.There is also a bedroll and static decorations 
for the tower with some simple but effective lighting,this is another great living mod ideal 
for the starter char or just as a storage base,thanks for looking. 

Features 
************ 
Blacksmiths table (Side of tower) 
Blacksmiths Tanning rack (Side of Tower) 
more interior decorations 
Spiritblade & Leveled items in strongbox (Side of tower in a handcart) 
Cooking area outside tower 
Smithys Anvil (Downstaris in tower) 
Smithys Sharpening Wheel (Downstairs in tower) 
Storage chests (2) 
Weapon Racks (4) 
Crafting tables 
Strongbox for items 
Dresser with armors 
Weapons & Supplies 
Bound Sword & Bow Spellbooks 

Thanks for looking...
author: EvilMrPumpkinsNexus
